# TextureResource.Contents

**Structure**

An object that references the pixel data for each mipmap level of a texture.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Contents
```

## Overview

Mipmaps are progressively smaller versions of the same texture image. Each level is half the size of the previous level, with a minimum size of 1 pixel in each dimension.

## Creating the content

- **init(mipmapLevels:)**: Creates a texture contents object from an array of mipmaps.

## Defining the content

- **TextureResource.Contents.MipmapLevel**: An object that references the pixel data for a single mipmap of a texture.
- **TextureResource.Contents.Slice**: An object that references the pixel data for a single slice of a mipmap.

## Creating a texture resource

- **TextureResource.Format**: The pixel format and encoding of a texture.
- **TextureResource.Compression**: The compression to apply when importing an image as a texture.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
